com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary

Class FragmentDeleteDone

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary.FragmentDeleteDone
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentReviewGrid, FragmentReviewLocationMap, FragmentReviewURLBrowser 

    public class FragmentDeleteDone
extends Fragment
    Standardised fragment for an activity with "Delete", "Done" and "Up" icons in the action bar.

    Shows a "Delete" (bin) and "Done" (tick) icon in the action bar. Also shows an "Up" icon by default effectively allowing a "Cancel" operation. Manages delete confirmation if delete pressed and there is data to delete. Also manages actions to perform on up/delete/done.
